Name: Prohibiting the operation of electric scooters and bicycles with electric assist in parks.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the operation of electric scooters and bicycles with electric assist in parks

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
This Introduction was Filed (End of Session)

Summary: This bill would prohibit the operation of electric scooters and bicycles with electric assist in any park under the jurisdiction of the department of parks and recreation.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. Section 19-176.2 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as amended by local laws number 72 and 73 for the year 2020, is amended by adding a new subdivision f to read as follows:
      f. Operation of an electric scooter, as defined in section 114-e of the vehicle and traffic law, and operation of a bicycle with electric assist, as defined in section 102-c of the vehicle and traffic law, shall be prohibited in any area of any park under the jurisdiction of the department of parks and recreation.
      ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect immediately.
